_description: Active predictions - append new predictions as JSONL

prediction: NATO effectively non-functional as alliance within 6 months
falsification: NATO conducts successful joint operation with full US participation; Article 5 credibility restored through concrete action
basis: Pattern of US-ally conflict (Greenland tariffs, territorial pressure, ally military deployment against US)
note: Original stated HIGH confidence for 6-month timeline

prediction: European strategic autonomy initiatives accelerate significantly
falsification: EU abandons defense autonomy initiatives; returns to full US security dependence
basis: EU activating anti-coercion instruments; allies deploying independent of US

prediction: Multipolar world order crystallizes with three-bloc structure (US, China, EU)
falsification: US-Europe alliance fully restored; liberal international order reconstituted under US leadership
basis: Cascade model extrapolation from current trajectory
note: Original stated MEDIUM confidence for 5-10 year timeline

prediction: Russia tests NATO deterrence in Baltic states during US-Europe rift
falsification: Russia does NOT engage in any Baltic provocation; deterrence remains functional despite alliance stress
basis: Historical pattern: adversaries exploit alliance fractures
note: Listed as counter-indicator in falsifiability section

prediction: Schedule F reclassifications create structural changes surviving current administration
falsification: Next administration reverses Schedule F; federal workforce capacity restored to pre-2025 levels
basis: Project 2025 designed for structural lock-in; personnel changes create path dependency

prediction: Additional NATO ally (beyond Denmark) faces explicit US territorial or economic pressure
falsification: No additional NATO territory faces US pressure; Greenland remains isolated case
basis: Pattern of escalating ally pressure; Canada already receiving annexation rhetoric

prediction: EU activates anti-coercion instrument against the United States
falsification: Tariffs reversed; anti-coercion instrument not used; alternative negotiated settlement reached
basis: EU publicly discussing â‚¬93-108B retaliation; 'trade bazooka' being prepared; US tariffs escalating

prediction: US Greenland tariffs escalate to 25% as threatened on June 1
falsification: Agreement reached with Denmark; tariffs dropped or reduced before June 1
basis: Pattern of following through on tariff threats; no indication of backing down

prediction: NATO Warsaw Summit (July 2026) marked by significant US-Europe tensions over Greenland/tariffs
falsification: Summit demonstrates renewed unity; Greenland crisis resolved; joint communique shows no fractures
basis: Current trajectory shows no signs of resolution; crisis deepening at Davos

prediction: Three Seas Initiative membership or association will include Turkey by 2030
falsification: Turkey rejected from or declines 3SI associate membership; Turkey-EU relations collapse completely preventing any integration
basis: Turkey strategic partnership with Poland, 600+ years relations, NATO ally, 3SI already includes Greece

prediction: Nordic-Baltic-Polish defense coordination formally institutionalized within B9+ framework
falsification: Nordic states create separate defense bloc excluding Poland; B9 remains unchanged with no Nordic participation
basis: Finland/Sweden first B9 attendance (2024), Poland NB8 summit (2024), ESSI integration, shared Russia threat perception

prediction: Romania becomes Poland's closest bilateral partner (measured by bilateral agreements, visits, joint initiatives)
falsification: Poland-Romania relations downgrade; another state (not Romania) becomes Poland's primary bilateral partner
basis: B9 co-founders, 1921 alliance legacy, March 3 Solidarity Day, shared Black Sea interests, NATO flank coordination

prediction: Hungary remains in Intermarium structures (V4, B9, 3SI) despite Russia policy divergence
falsification: Hungary exits V4 or B9; Hungary-Poland relations formally downgraded; Hungary vetoes critical Intermarium initiatives
basis: 1000+ year friendship, economic benefits of 3SI, V4 identity, domestic political benefits of regional leadership

prediction: Via Carpatia highway corridor substantially complete (Poland-Romania section operational)
falsification: Via Carpatia project stalls; Poland-Romania highway connection not operational by 2030
basis: 3SI priority project, EU funding available, strategic importance for north-south corridor
